title: How to start writing my original research proposal - Quora

response.answer_text: Before writing ,you need to go through research that has been published in your research area. While reading, jot down ideas that will crop up concerning your research area. Start your write up in the required format. Your research proposal has to be an extension of your ‘ jotted down' ideas( supported by the published papers you read), as to how you plan to proceed for your research and its intended aim.
